name: Static
title: devdojo.com
shortDescription: Static is a NodeJS-based static site generator designed to simplify the creation of fast, elegant static websites. It is ideal for developers who prefer a streamlined workflow and for those looking to host their sites on platforms like GitHub Pages. An example use case would be a developer quickly setting up a blog or a small business website using Static's command-line tools and enjoying features like live reloading and TailwindCSS integration.
cons: Less flexible than full CMS platforms

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Hugo
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Fast and flexible, supports large sites
